discovery_rule.name: LSIMegaRaid Controller 0: Physical disks slot discovery

item_prototype.name: LSIMegaRaid Controller $3: $1 has flagged a S.M.A.R.T alert

trigger_prototype.name: LSIMegaRaid Controller 0: {#PHYSNUM} has flagged a S.M.A.R.T alert on {HOST.NAME} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
LSIMegaRaid Controller 0: {#PHYSNUM} inquiry data changed on {HOST.NAME}
LSIMegaRaid Controller 0: {#PHYSNUM} Media Error Count on {HOST.NAME} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
LSIMegaRaid Controller 0: {#PHYSNUM} Other Error Count on {HOST.NAME} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
LSIMegaRaid Controller 0: {#PHYSNUM} Predictive Failure Count on {HOST.NAME} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
LSIMegaRaid Controller 0: {#PHYSNUM} state is not online on {HOST.NAME} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
LSIMegaRaid Controller 0: {#PHYSNUM} temperature is high on {HOST.NAME} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
LSIMegaRaid Controller 0: {#PHYSNUM} temperature is very high on {HOST.NAME} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
LSIMegaRaid Controller 0: {#VIRTNUM} Bad Blocks Exist on {HOST.NAME} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
LSIMegaRaid Controller 0: {#VIRTNUM} state is not optimal on {HOST.NAME} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
